name: @astrojs/mdx
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方MDX集成，用于在Astro项目中使用MDX格式。
descriptionEn: Astro's official MDX integration for using MDX format in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/rss
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方RSS插件，用于生成网站的RSS订阅源。
descriptionEn: Astro's official RSS plugin for generating RSS feeds for websites.

name: @astrojs/sitemap
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方站点地图插件，用于生成网站的XML站点地图。
descriptionEn: Astro's official sitemap plugin for generating XML sitemaps for websites.

name: astro-reading-time
author: Astro Community
description: 计算文章阅读时间的Astro插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for calculating article reading time.

name: astro-post-excerpt
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro博客文章生成摘要的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for generating excerpts for blog posts.

name: astro-toc
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro文章生成目录的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for generating table of contents for articles.

name: astro-seo-metadata
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站添加SEO元数据的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding SEO metadata to websites.

name: astro-expressive-code
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站提供增强的代码块展示功能。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for enhanced code block display.

name: super-tips
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站添加提示和技巧的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding tips and tricks to websites.

name: @jam-comments/astro
author: Jam Comments
description: 为Astro网站添加评论功能的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding comment functionality to websites.

name: astro-embed
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站嵌入各种媒体内容的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for embedding various media content.

name: astro-critical-css
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站生成关键CSS的插件，提高页面加载速度。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for generating critical CSS to improve page load speed.

name: @itsmatteomanf/astro-pagefind
author: Matteo Manfredi
description: 为Astro网站添加搜索功能的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding search functionality to websites.

name: astro-icon
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站添加图标支持的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding icon support to websites.

name: @jcayzac/astro-image-service-ng
author: Jean-Christophe Cayzac
description: Astro的下一代图片服务插件。
descriptionEn: Next-generation image service plugin for Astro.
